languages.text: "Если госпоже понравится вкус этого плода, мы с тобой вознесемся".
"You and I will ascend if the mistress enjoys the taste of this fruit."
languages.original_text: "Если госпоже понравится вкус этого плода, мы с тобой вознесемся".

traits.locale_text: "You and I will ascend If the mistress enjoys the taste of this fruit."
"You and I will ascend If the mistress enjoys the taste of this fruit."
"You and I will ascend if the mistress enjoys the taste of this fruit."
"You and I will ascend if the mistress enjoys the taste of this fruit."
"You and I will ascend if the mistress enjoys the taste of this fruit."

languages.text: “如果女主人喜欢这份饮品，咱们的好日子就来了。”
languages.original_text: "You and I will ascend if the mistress enjoys the taste of this fruit."

traits.locale_text: “如果女主人喜欢这份饮品，咱们的好日子就来了。”

languages.text: 「上手くあの女をやっつけることができれば、俺とお前の出世は間違いない」
languages.original_text: "You and I will ascend if the mistress enjoys the taste of this fruit."

traits.locale_text: 「上手くあの女をやっつけることができれば、俺とお前の出世は間違いない」

languages.text: « Nous aurons droit à de l'avancement si la maîtresse apprécie le goût de ce fruit. »
languages.original_text: "You and I will ascend if the mistress enjoys the taste of this fruit."

traits.locale_text: « Nous aurons droit à de l'avancement si la maîtresse apprécie le goût de ce fruit. »

languages.text: «Si a la señora le gusta el sabor de esta fruta, seguro que nos asciende».
languages.original_text: "You and I will ascend if the mistress enjoys the taste of this fruit."

traits.locale_text: «Si a la señora le gusta el sabor de esta fruta, seguro que nos asciende».

languages.text: "Wir beide werden aufsteigen, wenn der Herrin der Geschmack dieser Frucht behagt."
languages.original_text: "You and I will ascend if the mistress enjoys the taste of this fruit."

traits.locale_text: "Wir beide werden aufsteigen, wenn der Herrin der Geschmack dieser Frucht behagt."

languages.text: "Hanımefendi bu meyvenin tadını beğenirse yerimiz hazır."
languages.original_text: "You and I will ascend if the mistress enjoys the taste of this fruit."

traits.locale_text: "Hanımefendi bu meyvenin tadını beğenirse yerimiz hazır."
